message:
Here are pictures my gifts to the Iranian President Dr. Hassan Rouhani. 

They are specially commissioned reproductions of Mirza Asadullah Khan Ghalib’s collection of Persian poetry, Kulliyat-e-Farsi-e-Ghalib and Sumair Chand’s Persian translation of Ramayana. 

First published in 1863, Kulliyat-e-Farsi-e-Ghalib is a collection of over 11,000 verses by Ghalib. 

The reproduction is from a rare copy of the book’s 1867 edition to which some missing pages have been added. They have been added from a copy of the 1872 edition from Maulana Azad’s personal collection preserved in the library of ICCR in Delhi. 

Translated into Persian in 1715 and copied in 1826, Sumair Chand’s Ramayana is a rare manuscript at the Rampur Raza Library. http://nm-4.com/25tp
